title: Hour 3 - Kevin Weekes (06-11-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Kevin Weekes (06-11-20)
description:
Kevin Weekes tells Dan about his experiences as a black goalie in the NHL on a nightly bases. Kevin says that every sports league should have a zero tolerance against racism.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
